post:
[Qovic Online Solutions LLP](https://qovic.com/) - Web hosting, Dedicated Servers, WHMCS Modules, Server Management.

We're shipping some new hardware to our new Datacenters Psychz, LA & Internap, NYC and exclusively for LET we've set aside limited quantity servers for grabs.

Dual E5-2620v2<br />
32GB RAM ECC<br />
4x240GB SSD<br />
10TB @ 1Gbps<br />
/29 IPv4<br />
$82/mo

[Order Now](https://qovic.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=30)

* Only 3 units for taking.
* Provisioning duration is 1 week, first come first serve basis.
* RAM is upgradable for a one-time setup fee and no additional recurring fee.
* IPv6 can be provided on request
* Managed Services are also provided on hourly / per ticket basis.

#Test IP

Internap NYC - 63.251.20.100<br />
Psychz, LA - 104.149.18.203

#About Us
Formed and operational since 2016 as a registered LLP situated in India. Qovic connects the dots between business and IT making the process of marking your presence online a breeze.

#24x7 Support
Normally we have proactive monitoring in place for all our servers, even so, if you should face any problem we're always available on-call vide our phone number +91 40 4033 99 83. We're always available to take your call(s) with utmost priority. (You can call us to even say Hi!)
